In technology environments, this maps to 'Interface navigation', highlighting similar principles of system reliability, workflow coordination, and performance optimization. Understanding this concept helps teams design processes that are resilient, efficient, and scalable.

• Tech Ops: Engineers confirm interface navigation is complete before deployment.
• Failure Scenario: When 'Menu navigation' is skipped, delays and errors cascade.
• Scaling Scenario: Strong interface navigation practices allow systems to scale smoothly.
